content.body: Ecma International has approved the 2024 editions of ECMA-262 and ECMA-402

Is anyone aware of a place where public WebAssembly spec test results are posted for each engine? Similar to test262.fyi, ideally. If none exists, I'll probably just bug canadahonk to add something as a subdomain there ðŸ˜„.
